name: Degi Chargha Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Degi Chargha Recipe: Chicken 1 kg whole give deep cuts Yogurt 3 tbsp Chili powder 2 tsp heaped Vinegar 2 to 3 tsp All spice 1 tsp Salt 1Â½ tsp Egg 1 Yellow color pinch Ginger garlic 1 tsp heaped Chat masala 1 tsp to sprinkle
instructions: Marinate chicken with all the given ingredients for 2 to 3 hours Put in a pan on low flame Cover and cook on steam and then fry, sprinkle with chat masala Serve with onion sliced, salad leaves and nan.
